description: A massive enemy army is descending from the Western Mountains, surrounding the castle and preparing for a coordinated assault.
Light cavalry units have been spotted riding swiftly from the Northern Ridge. A sudden strike is imminent.
A gang of ruthless raiders has appeared to the east of the castle, ready to plunder and burn.
A violent hurricane is sweeping through the valley. The castle's defenses will be tested like never before.
A heavy snowstorm engulfs the region. Visibility is low and structures are under stress.
New clay deposits have been discovered nearby. These resources speed up the repair of some damaged sectors.
Siege machines are being constructed in the southern foothills. Prepare for a long-range assault.
Undead warriors rise from ancient graves near the eastern border. Their eerie march cannot be ignored.
A fire has broken out in the barracks. Was it sabotage or just bad luck?
A group of skilled builders joins your cause. Repair efforts are now faster and more effective.
A shipment of strong timber arrives from the northern forest. Use it to fortify one sector immediately.
Bandits ambush a supply caravan en route to the castle, reducing your reinforcement options.
A lunar eclipse spreads unease across the land. Superstitions affect troop morale.
A famous knight arrives, offering his sword for one battle. He inspires courage and reduces incoming damage.
The local blacksmith unveils new armor upgrades. All sectors gain temporary resistance.
A healing herb garden blooms after spring rains. Healers can now restore more health per turn.
A catapult barrage from the eastern hills smashes against your outer defenses.
Fog blankets the battlefield. All attacks next turn have a chance to miss.
Local villagers volunteer to help defend the walls. Their support strengthens the weakest sector.
Poisoned arrows are fired from unseen enemies in the forest. Defenders are weakened.
